title: How to Change Discord Email Without Verification: Workarounds

steps.title: Navigate to the support page of your old email provider.
steps.content: Navigate to the support page of your old email provider. For example, if you had a Yahoo email, you'd go to Yahoo's account help . If you have a Gmail account, go to Google's Gmail help page .

steps.title: Look for troubleshooting tips, if necessary.
steps.content: Look for troubleshooting tips, if necessary. If you simply forgot your password to your old email address, check your email provider's support page for troubleshooting on how to gain access to your old account. If you deleted your account or the troubleshooting doesn't work, move to the next step.

steps.title: Contact your email provider.
steps.content: Contact your email provider. If you can't figure out your old password or you deleted your account entirely, submit a support ticket to your old email provider. They may be able to help you gain access to your old account. Remember to be patient and courteous with support staff. They may require verification that the account belongs to you.

steps.title: Send the Discord email verification once you get back in.
steps.content: Send the Discord email verification once you get back in. From there, you can change your Discord email to an email you have more reliable access to.

steps.title: Go to the homepage of your old email address provider.
steps.content: Go to the homepage of your old email address provider. If you deleted your account, you may be able to remake the email with the same name if it hasn't been taken.

steps.title: Sign up for a new account.
steps.content: Sign up for a new account. When signing up for a new account, create your email address with the same name as your old one. Note that some email address providers may not let you do this, or there may be a waiting period before you can use that email address name again.

steps.title: Send the Discord email verification once you remake the account.
steps.content: Send the Discord email verification once you remake the account. From there, you can change your Discord email to an email you have reliable access to.

steps.title: Navigate to your email on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Navigate to your email on your phone or tablet. If you lost access to your old email account, you may still be signed in on your phone or tablet. You could be signed in on the mobile app or the email's mobile website.

steps.title: Check if you're still logged in with the required email.
steps.content: Check if you're still logged in with the required email. If you are, open it to ensure you can access the email inbox.

steps.title: Send the Discord email verification once you get back in.
steps.content: Send the Discord email verification once you get back in. From there, you can change your Discord email to an email you have more reliable access to.

steps.title: Create a new account if you cannot access your old email.
steps.content: Create a new account if you cannot access your old email. If none of the above methods work or it's impossible to get back into the old account (i.e., a school email account after you've graduated), you will have to make a new account . Alternatively, you can keep using your old account, but if something happens to it that requires email verification, you will be locked out permanently.
